sentence.Network_en: I had the most almighty row with the waitress.
sentence.Network_cn: 我和女招待大吵了一架。

sentence.Network_en: The next moment there was an almighty crash.
sentence.Network_cn: 接着发生了剧烈的撞击。

entry.tran: 全能者（指上帝）；全能的上帝
entry.def: The Almighty is another name for God. You can also refer to Almighty God .

example.ex: Adam sought guidance from the Almighty...
Let us now confess our sins to Almighty God.
example.tran: 现在让我们向上帝忏悔我们的罪恶。

entry.tran: （表示惊奇、愤怒或恐惧，可能具冒犯意味）上帝呀，耶稣呀
entry.def: People sometimes say God Almighty or Christ Almighty to express their surprise, anger, or horror. These expressions could cause offence.
Almighty means very serious or great in extent.

example.ex: I had the most almighty row with the waitress...
example.tran: 我和女招待大吵了一架。

auth_sentence.content: Does is improve the almighty "working memory"?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Does is improve the almighty "working memory"?

auth_sentence.content: That is an almighty achievement if he did it clean.

sentences.en: Almighty God/God Almighty appeared to Jacob in the land of Canaan.
sentences.cn: 全能之神在迦南福地对雅各显灵。

sentences.en: All of a sudden I heard an almighty crash from the kitchen.
sentences.cn: 突然我听到厨房里传来一声巨响。

jushi.english: Love of the almighty dollar has ruined many people.
jushi.chinese: 对万能的金钱的贪婪断送了许多人。

jushi.english: Let us pray to Almighty God.
jushi.chinese: 让我们向万能的上帝祈祷吧。

jushi.english: Almighty God, have mercy on us.
